version_description:
London is coming to your street with its famous Big Ben, shops and characters.

Fixes:
- fixed missing facebook friends

What's new?
- Princess and dragons are coming to your streets with the Fairy Tale theme
- Insertion tool for the buildings to help rearrange your street
- Upgrade arrows above buildings can be hidden for players level 30+
- Improved facebook s

What's new?
- Princess and dragons are coming to your streets with the Fairy Tale theme
- Insertion tool for the buildings to help rearrange your street
- Upgrade arrows above buildings can be hidden for players level 30+
- Improved facebook s

A new update adding a lot of high level buildings.
- New high level (35+) houses, businesses and decorations for the main and seaside street.
- New card only buildings for each main character
- fixed a few stability issues when watching videos

New Fabric Theme:
- A new house with never seen before characters
- New businesses and decorations

The dinosaurs are here
- Build the cute prehistoric house to bring some really old villagers to your Happy Street
- Dinosaurs and crazy vehicles will bring new villagers
- New businesses including a mask shop with unique masks.

Fixes:

- New egyptian theme, bring the pharaons to your village and build the pyramid combo.
- Halloween is back with a ton of content!

- Fixed rare frozen screen when coming back to the game

- Fixed crash after watching a video
- Fixed crash with large streets
- Fix slowdown and crash when visiting friends

Happy Year of the monkey!

Lunar New Year and St-Valentin Themes are back!

Happy Year of the monkey!

Lunar New Year and St-Valentin Themes are back!

Happy Year of the monkey!

Lunar New Year and St-Valentin Themes are back!

Happy Year of the monkey!

Lunar New Year and St-Valentin Themes are back!

- Fixed missing buildings in the seaside street

Let's roll out the red carpet, the music Stars are coming to your Happy Street.

And let's celebrate the St-Patrick and Easter!

New themes:
- Princess and dragons are coming to your streets with the Fairy Tale theme!
- London is coming to your street with its famous Big Ben, shops and characters.

To celebrate the 4 years of Happy Street we have done some major rework, all the interfaces have been completely redone and are now in full HD.

And the dinosaurs are invading your village

New York is coming to your Happy Street, build the Statue of Liberty and bring New Yorkers, Jazz, Firemen, Time Square and more!

+ Fixed empty facebook names
+ Fixed posting photos to facebook
Meet the cute kawaii creatures in this fresh new Happy Street Theme!

Happy Halloween,
+ Welcome to the Y≈çkai family, the new addition to the Halloween theme.
+ Added a new way to add friends with their username.
+ Fixed upload to the server of really large village

Christmas Theme is back !

+ fixed several crashes
Christmas Theme is back ! Get ready to get some amazing gifts with the Christmas Tree and the Advent Calendar
Happy Lunar New Year!

St Patrick and Easter Themes are here.
+ New additions to the Easter Themes

+ Welcome to Tokyo! Enjoy this new Theme
+ new ads system
+ fixed several issues
Christmas is almost there, grow your christmas tree and open your gifts every day with the advent calendar.
